name: vet-transcription-platform
description: Scalable veterinary transcription platform with NestJS, Firebase, Stripe, and AI-powered medical record generation
author: Vet Transcription Team

scripts.dev: npm run dev -w backend & npm run dev -w frontend
scripts.build: npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w frontend && npm run build -w workers
scripts.test: npm run test -w backend && npm run test -w frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w backend && npm run lint -w frontend
